Independence Day, July 4th, has been celebrated by Americans for centuries. It is observed by U.S. citizens in America, wherever they live and wherever they travel. I don´t understand why someone would say "we celebrate July 9th, now." The announcement that an American Celebration was cancelled because of a health scare had nothing to due with an Argen-tine holiday. I am very offended by this person´s remark.
Relax, it looks like it was just an attempt at humor. This stupid flu is ruining everyone's fun and onda. Everyone have fun today!
